mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspAbTestSetMod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AB_TEST_SN , SET_TURN , MOD_TURN , MOD_RESN_CONT , BEG_DT , END_DT , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT , REGTR_ID FROM DSP_AB_TEST_SET_MOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND AB_TEST_SN = #{abTestSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND SET_TURN = #{setTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND MOD_TURN = #{modTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
